response.overview: After she spends all her money, an evil enchantress queen schemes to marry a handsome, wealthy prince. There's just one problem - he's in love with a beautiful princess, Snow White. Now, joined by seven rebellious dwarves, Snow White launches an epic battle of good vs. evil...
response.tagline: The Snow White legend comes alive.
response.title: Mirror Mirror

titles.title: Mirror Mirror: The Untold Adventures of Snow White
